title: ISic000696. I.Sicily inscription 000696
body:
Facsimile Images

------
[--- proc(uratori) f]aṃ[il(iarum) glad(iatoriarum)]
[per ---] Sic(iliam) Ae[m(iliam) ---]
[---] Dalma[t(iam) ---]
[proc(uratori) Ludi Matuti]ni duc[en(ario) Ludi Magni]
------

Apparatus criticus

Text after Buonocore 1992; Manganaro: [--- proc(urator) f]aṃ[il(iae) glad(atoriae) (!)]
line.4: Manganaro: [proc. ? ludi mag]ni, duc[enarius---]

English translation

...to the procurator of the families of gladiators...Sicily, Aemilia...Damlatia....procurator of the Ludi Matutini, ducenarius of the Ludi Magni...

commentary

bibliography

  • 1989.0339c https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Manganaro 1989 165 no.25 fig.25 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001831
  • 26 no.3 tav.VI fig.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002647
  • Manganaro 1988 58 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
